hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#/home/jenkins/ci_check/src/jenkinsfile/lcr.py -a ${arch} #rpms=(git \ # svn \ # gcc \ # python3-pip \ # python3-devel) #sudo rm -f *.rpm #sudo yum downgrade -y "${rpms[@]}" --downloadonly --downloaddir=./ --allowerasing --skip-broken --nobest || true #sudo yum install -y "${rpms[@]}" --downloadonly --downloaddir=./ --allowerasing --skip-broken --nobest #sudo rpm -Uvh --force --nodeps *.rpm || true #function pip_conf() #{ #if [[ ! -d ~/.pip ]] #then # mkdir ~/.pip #fi #touch ~/.pip/pip.conf # cat ~/.pip/pip.conf << EOF #[global] #index-url = https://mirrors.huaweicloud.com/repository/pypi/simple #trust-host = mirrors.huaweicloud.com #timeout = 120 #EOF #} #sudo yum install -y svn gcc python3-pip python3-devel python3-Cython #sudo pip3 config set global.index-url https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/pypi/simple
#cp -a "${repo}" ci_check/ #sudo pip3 install -r ci_check/src/requirements #export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:ci_check #python3 ci_check/src/jenkinsfile/openeuler_jenkins_test.py #rm -rf ci_check/src/jenkinsfile/test.log
function config_osc() { cat > /home/jenkins/.oscrc << EOF [general] apiurl = http://117.78.1.88 no_verify = 1 build-root = /home/jenkins/agent/buildroot
[http://117.78.1.88] user = $OBSUserName pass = $OBSPassword trusted_prj = openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP3:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:selfbuild:function openEuler:20.09:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP1:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:21.03:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP2:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:21.09:selfbuild:BaseOS openEuler:20.03:LTS:Next:selfbuild:BaseOS # 不用输0,1,2了 EOF }
config_osc osc getbinaries openEuler:Factory git-lfs standard_x86_64 x86_64 rpm -ivh binaries *.rpm
